name: hexabot
description: Hexabot is a solution for creating and managing chatbots across multiple channels, leveraging AI for advanced conversational capabilities. It provides a user-friendly interface for building, training, and deploying chatbots with integrated support for various messaging platforms.
author: Hexastack

scripts.release:api:patch: cd api/ && npm version --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false patch
scripts.release:api:minor: cd api/ && npm version --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false minor
scripts.release:patch: npm run release:api:patch && npm version --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false --workspaces patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run release:api:minor && npm version --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false --workspaces minor
